document_data.name: Lodar
document_data.mainbody: '''Lodar''' was the cheerful tavern master of the [[Bubbling Cauldron]] in the village of [[Hilltop]] in the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], after a [[kobold]] attack on Hilltop, Lodar's chef [[Mara (chef)|Mara]] was taken hostage in the tavern's kitchen by a band of kobolds, led by [[Hurc]], who had been separated from the main group. He would ask [[Drogan Droganson's pupil]] to free Mara from the kobolds.
